Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: அறஞ்சாரா நல்குரவு ஈன்றதா யானும்பிறன்போல நோக்கப் படும்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: He that is reduced to absolute poverty will be regarded as a stranger even by his own mother.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A young man is suffering from a poverty that is not associated with virtue ('அறம் சாரா நல்குரவு'). He is destitute and perhaps looks slightly disreputable.
Layered_Composition.Midground: He approaches his own mother ('ஈன்ற தாய்') for help and comfort.
Layered_Composition.Background: His mother looks at him not with the warmth and love of a parent, but with the cold, distant, and mistrustful gaze of a stranger ('பிறன் போல நோக்கப்படும்'). His dishonorable poverty has broken the most fundamental human bond.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A person afflicted by a non-virtuous poverty will be looked upon as a stranger even by the very mother who gave birth to them.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The mother's cold, estranged gaze is the central and most heartbreaking element of the image. The distinction that this is a 'non-virtuous' poverty is important; it is not noble suffering, but the poverty that comes from vice, which is what severs the bond.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A cold, grey, unforgiving light. The mother and son are separated by an invisible wall of emotional distance. The palette is desaturated to emphasize the lack of familial warmth.

Technical_Cues.Camera: An intimate but cold two-shot, focusing on the lack of connection between the two faces. The emotional distance should be palpable.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, focusing on the subtle expressions of estrangement and pain.
